name: Wizards' Folly | GMTK 2022
description:
Two wizards got together, and played a game with tankards and 20-sided dice they found at the local tavern... This game is now known as Wizards' Folly.

It's basically beer pong, but with a fantasy twist.

Controls:

Use the mouse to aim, and hold the left mouse button to charge up your shot according to the arrow that appears.
